text: asked for table no., cashier mentioned "sorry i already press in the order couldn't do that for you." it's not busy at all, there were no orders, i don't understand why just a marking of a table no. on the receipt or their order paper a problem, stand there for 10 mins for the food, thought they will call out for no. when food r ready, so i went back to my seat. however, i waited for another 5 mins, i didn't hear any no. called, i went to check my food was there waiting lonely. and my coke float isn't coke float anymore. HORRIBLE SERVICE. can't believe mcd is like that already.

Worst service at Macdonald I have ever encountered. Upon ordering I found that it was not indicated whether hot or cold Milo. I told their crew I wanted hot Milo (written by crew on receipt).. upon return I found cold Milo waiting. I am sick with bad cough! I asked their staff and was told ‚Äúcannot change!‚Äù.. made some noise and their manager came who is totally hopeless.. without checking anything, the attitude was can change but need to take back scratch card???? Totally missed the point?? I did not abuse their staff in any way but talked loudly as I was agitated!! Made me feel like a criminal? And then when I said I don‚Äôt want the Milo, she abruptly ran into the kitchen without any word of assurances or apology ! Lousiest service I have ever encountered. Here is proof I told their staff (handwriting is there!!) Macdonald maybe you need to review your staff training .. customers should be right but now I feel bad üò¢

I will like to express my sincere appreciation for the outstanding service provided by Shikin during our recent visit. Our family had a fantastic experience, and her dedication truly made a difference.

Despite facing some technical issues with the McDonald‚Äôs app, Shikin went the extra mile to assist us, ensuring that everything was resolved smoothly. Her attentiveness, patience, and willingness to help did not go unnoticed. Thanks to her, we were able to enjoy our meal without any hassle.

We deeply appreciate her effort and would like to recognize her for delivering such excellent customer service.

Thank you once again, Shikin, for making our visit so enjoyable!
This Mc is very clean and having a good friendly staff. Service also good. It opened until 12am.
The ice cream portion is significantly much much smaller than usual. Ordered a chocolate sundae, the ice cream dont even fill to the cup - considering theres also gaps in the cup of ice cream.
